verses.roman:
bhaṭṭa kahe,--kāhāṅ āmi jīva pāmara
kāhāṅ tumi sei kṛṣṇa,--sākṣāt īśvara

synonyms: bhaṭṭa kahe—Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa said; kāhāṅ—whereas; āmi—I; jīva—an ordinary living being; pāmara—fallen; kāhāṅ—whereas; tumi—You; sei kṛṣṇa—the same Supreme Personality of Godhead, Kṛṣṇa; sākṣāt īśvara—directly the Lord.
translation: Veṅkaṭa Bhaṭṭa then said, "I am an ordinary fallen living entity, but You are Kṛṣṇa, the Supreme Personality of Godhead Himself.
